newsitem.title: USA: MindSpring files for 3.5 mln common share.
newsitem.headline: MindSpring files for 3.5 mln common share.

text.p: MindSpring Enterprises Inc filed Friday with the Securities and Exchange Commission for up to 3.5 million common shares.

Net proceeds will be used to pay for subscriber accounts and other assets it is buying from PSINet Inc and from The News and Obvserver Publishing Co's Nando.net Internet access business and other subscriber purchases, it said.
Proceeds will also be used for capital expenditures through the end of 1996, working capital, general corporate purposes and possible acquisitions.
The offering will be made through J.C. Bradford & Co, Wheat First Butcher Singer and Robinson-Humphrey Cop Inc. The underwriters have an overallotment option for up to 525,000 additional shares.
